statements: SELECT * FROM species_population;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM species_population;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_count, last_updated FROM species_population;
SELECT * FROM species_population ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM species_population WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM species_population WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM species_population WHERE population_count BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_count FROM species_population WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' OR species_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_count, last_updated FROM species_population WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY species_name, last_updated DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species, AVG(population_count) AS average_population FROM species_population WHERE population_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population FROM Species ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT species_name, population FROM Species WHERE population > 1000;
SELECT species_name, population FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Population_Records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, population FROM Species WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Population_Records WHERE population_count >= 1000 ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, SUM(population) AS total_population FROM Species GROUP BY species_name HAVING total_population > 5000;
SELECT species_name, population_count, record_date FROM Species JOIN Population_Records ON Species.id = Population_Records.species_id WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(species_name) AS species_count, AVG(population) AS avg_population FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM species_population;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM species_population WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_count, last_updated FROM species_population WHERE species_name='Tiger';
SELECT update_id, species_name, new_population_count, update_date FROM population_update WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM species_population WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_count, last_updated FROM species_population WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT species_name, new_population_count, update_date FROM population_update WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM species_population GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY avg_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM PopulationRecord WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, date_updated FROM Species ORDER BY date_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT species_name, observation_date FROM Species INNER JOIN PopulationRecord ON Species.species_id = PopulationRecord.species_id;

SELECT species_name, category_name FROM Species INNER JOIN SpeciesCategoryMap ON Species.species_id = SpeciesCategoryMap.species_id INNER JOIN SpeciesCategory ON SpeciesCategoryMap.category_id = SpeciesCategory.category_id;
SELECT species_name, population_amount, date_updated FROM Species INNER JOIN PopulationRecord ON Species.species_id = PopulationRecord.species_id ORDER BY date_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(species_id) FROM Species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT region_name FROM Region WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species WHERE species_id = 2;

SELECT ph.population_count, ph.measurement_date, p.species_id FROM PopulationHistory ph JOIN Population p ON ph.population_id = p.population_id WHERE p.species_id = 1 ORDER BY ph.measurement_date DESC;
SELECT r.region_name, h.habitat_type FROM Region r LEFT JOIN Habitat h ON r.region_id = h.region_id WHERE h.habitat_type = 'Forest';

SELECT s.species_id, s.species_name, COUNT(p.population_id) AS total_population FROM Species s LEFT JOIN Population p ON s.species_id = p.species_id GROUP BY s.species_id HAVING total_population > 100 ORDER BY total_population DESC;
